name: Tetrotiles
description:
A mash-up of Tetris and Club Penguin's Thin Ice. Build your own paths with the given Tetrominos to reach the end of each level. Be careful not to fall!

Controls:
'W', 'A', 'S', & 'D' -- move (player/tetromino)
'Q' & 'E' -- rotate (tetromino)
'Space' -- confirm placement (tetromino)
'P' -- restart current level

BGM Credits:
Pokémon Diamond and Pearl: Eterna Forest [Lofi Remix] by GlitchxCity
